pr_title: MekHQ 1636: Fixing ForceGenerationOptionsPanel Null Pointer Issues

timeline.bodyText: Unnecessary hyphen. Subcommand is a perfectly valid spelling.
timeline.author: neoancient

replies.bodyText: Reverted, and fixed my customized autocorrect for this one.
replies.author: Windchild292

timeline.bodyText: Unnecessary hyphen. Subfaction is perfectly valid.
timeline.author: neoancient

replies.bodyText: Reverted, although technically subfaction is not a word and sub-faction is the proper spelling.
replies.author: Windchild292

replies.bodyText: Language is defined by use. It is an element of language that conveys meaning, and is therefore a word.
replies.author: neoancient
